title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
China is higher than any other categories with value 21.8, followed by United States, and Argentina. Down to category Netherlands with the lowest value of 4.3.
The highest value at China is almost 5.07 times larger than the minimum value of Netherlands.
The highest value at China is almost 5.07 times larger than the minimum value of Netherlands.
The difference between the max Country China and min Country Netherlands is 17.5.
